name: Abraca-DOG-bra Group Itch (Maddie, Jacob, Oscar, Marcus)
name_original: Abraca-DOG-bra Group Itch (Maddie, Jacob, Oscar, Marcus)
description:
GROUP SUBMISSION PAGE

STORY:

You, a witch, are searching in the forest to find some ingredients for your potions and brews until you come across a poor and helpless dog who has found themselves stuck in a bear trap. They wish and dream to be the winner of The Great Dog Beauty Competition however with their leg messed up they will never win. Will you help the pup pursue its dreams?

Game Info:

The Game is created similarly to a WarioWare type game as a collection of microgames the player can play in. Although it is a collection of Microgames it is in a narrative based order so all the games will be in a chronological order of tasks to act out to allow the pup in the story to pursue its dreams in the dog beauty competition.

Team:
